DESCRIPTION: A debuff that prevents other debuffs from decaying over time.
A damage over time effect that decays by half each turn.
A 2 cost skill that removes Corruption.
A 1 cost skill that makes you Intangible, but shuffles a curse into your draw pile.
A 1 cost Curse that retains, and saps your energy at the start of each turn.
A status effect that increases both damage done and taken from attacks.
A debuff that deals damage equal to the player's Corruption at the end of each turn.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
